name: Psiral
description:
Psiral is a fun and easy to play turn based strategy board game in which four wizards battle to reach the fountain of endless energy. This, of course, will bring them eternity and power beyond human imagination. Each wizard controls the powers of one of the four known elements, earth, water, fire and wood… err, I mean air. Who will get to the fountain first? Choose and find out.

You can also get Psiral for free from the Chrome Web Store.

If you like this game, please consider a donation. We'd like to further develop it and add more character skills, different maps and expand the gameplay.

MacBook Pro users! The game has a bug displaying the graphics correctly on retina displays. This is an issue that is yet to be fixed.
